name: Opticor
description:
Opticor is an ominous puzzle-platformer, in which you control two characters to find their way together, towards a large tower in their far vicinity. Will they make it together? And what will the tower present them with?

Made as part of the Global Game Jam 2022

To play, simply download the zip file, unpack, and run the Unity application.

Delvelopers:
   Christian Hvidkjær
   Oliver Astrup (https://plyspeter.itch.io/)
   Sindre Valen Aasland (https://hafrass.itch.io/)
   Lucas Helin Petersen (https://luxthedude.itch.io/)
   Mikkel Ditlevsen (https://ditlevsen.itch.io/)

External Assets:
- Font: https://www.dafont.com/sticky-notes-3.font
- Drag sound: https://freesound.org/s/325929/
